name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Staff Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in full-stack development leveraging **Ruby on Rails**, **Django**, **Spring Boot**, **JavaScript**, **Python**, **Go**, **Java**, and **Node.js**. Proficient in building high-performance applications with deep expertise in cloud solutions **AWS** and robust integrations with messaging systems like **Kafka** and **SQS**. Skilled in developing and implementing **RESTful APIs** and **GraphQL** endpoints to enhance application interoperability.

Expertise in driving CI/CD pipelines using tools like **Jenkins** and **Gitlab**, ensuring smooth deployments, system observability, and automated testing practices for increased reliability. Strong background in AI/ML integration, implementing Domain-Driven Design principles, and using advanced performance diagnostics techniques to optimize application functionality. Proven leadership in architecting enterprise-grade platforms with a focus on compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, alongside implementing machine learning workflows using state-of-the-art technologies.
